extendedInfo.description: It's called "Shoot Many Robots" â do we really need to explain more? Okâ¦This endless runner (and gunner) has you playing as P. Walter Tugnut, the hapless hillbilly who loves nothing more than killing robots. Jettisoned from his RV, Walter barrels through farmlands and oil fields, shooting every chainsaw-wielding toaster that gets in his way. And there are LOTS of robots in his way. Full of explosive, robot-crushing action, Shoot Many Robots skips the fluff and delivers the gruff. Did we mention youâll be shooting a bazillion robots?REVIEWS:âââââ "BEST GAME EVAR!!"  â A Totally Real Journalistâââââ "Is what game awesome? Stop bothering me. Can't you see I'm shooting robots?!" â Your MomFEATURES:  â¢ Endless running and gunning action  â¢ Silly Hats give you special abilities (duh)  â¢ Challenges & daily rewards  â¢ Rank up and expand your arsenal  â¢ Simple controls: tap to shoot, swipe to change lanes  â¢ Revolutionary exploding red barrels  â¢ Beautiful 3D environments  â¢ HD graphics for high resolution displaysDemiurge Studios teamed up with Owlchemy Labs, creators of Snuggle Truck, to bring the hit Shoot Many Robots to Android so that you can kill robots on-the-go! Let us know what you think on our forums, Facebook, and Twitter:www.demiurgestudios.com/communitywww.facebook.com/ShootManyRobots@ShootManyRobots

reviews.title: I love it (and helpful tips)
reviews.comment: It is an amazing game.I love how there is the pause thing showing the hillbilly and the robot having a beer brake.anyway, now for the tips.1. Use the crate weapons only for the big robots. And im talking about level 3+ (first there is baby spider, then average chainsaw, then there are the abnormal ones. Abnormal are about level 3 or higher.) 2. For those who dont know, the areas on the ground that are cracked have the underground ones that pop out. 4. (This almost applys with ALL GAMES that have upgrade shops) upgrade the money maker/enhancer and unlimited ammo weps as priority (or in this case, upgrade the pistols.) If you remember the 4th one, you will be an even better gamer
reviews.author: Morris Wolfe

reviews.title: Its a fun game but horrible controls.
reviews.comment: The game is actually really fun but the downfall is the control set up. The buttons for the second gun are way to far, and should be above the main gun. Also when you want to jump it swipes you up or down or if you want to go up or down it makes you jump. Why is there no dedicated jump button? Also the weapons get more and more useless as you upgrade.
reviews.author: Timothy Horne

reviews.title: Poor port of the PC game
reviews.comment: The PC game is fun, but the micro transactions and ads are too disruptive. I\'d rather just pay $5 up front.
reviews.author: Kevin Pelton

reviews.title: Wish it had Zombies mode!
reviews.comment: This is awesome and a great time killer. Works as smooth as ever on real Android (Nex4) Just hate that items aren\'t permanent so you\'ll eventually go broke. I think this year I\'m giving up the pay to advance games. Going for the pay one time upfront games as these PTA games\' purchases aren\'t transferred when you get a new device/upgrade. Waste of time and money eventually.
reviews.author: Michael W
